title: 과거 활동 표현
description: 과거에 했던 활동과 경험을 표현하는 동사의 과거형을 배웁니다.

words.example: I went to the park yesterday.
words.mnemonic: Go → Went: 완전히 다른 모양! '갔다'는 '간 것'이 변한 것처럼
Ate = Eight(8)과 발음이 같다! '8조각 피자를 먹었다'

words.example: I saw a movie last night.
words.mnemonic: See → Saw: 톱(saw)으로 나무를 자르는 것을 '봤다'

confusableWords.difference: Saw는 동사 '봤다'와 명사 '톱' 두 가지 의미
Watched는 집중해서 본 것, Saw는 눈에 들어온 것

words.mnemonic: Buy → Bought: 완전히 다른 모양! 'ought' 패턴 (thought, brought)
Study → Studied: y를 i로 바꾸고 ed 추가

additionalExamples.sentence: What did you do last night?
What did you do last weekend?

words.example: Two days ago, I met her.

additionalExamples.sentence: A week ago, I was in Seoul.
Long ago, there was a king.

words.example: I was happy. They were tired.

confusableWords.difference: Was는 단수(I, he, she, it), Were는 복수(we, they) 및 you

words.mnemonic: Read 현재(/리드/)와 Read 과거(/레드/)는 철자 같지만 발음 다름!

additionalExamples.sentence: I met him at the cafe.

words.mnemonic: Think → Thought: 완전히 다른 모양! 'ought' 패턴

confusableWords.difference: Left는 동사 '떠났다'와 명사/형용사 '왼쪽' 두 가지 의미

exercises.question: What is the past tense of 'go'?
Which word means '먹었다'?
I ___ a movie yesterday. (see의 과거형)
She ___ her homework. (do의 과거형)
What does 'yesterday' mean?
Which is the past tense of 'play'?
We ___ basketball last weekend. (play의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'have'?
Match the present with past tense:
I ___ a new book. (buy의 과거형)
Which phrase means '지난주'?
They ___ to my house. (come의 과거형)
What does 'ago' mean?
exercises.explanation: 'ago'는 '~전에'라는 뜻입니다. (예: two days ago = 이틀 전에)

exercises.question: What is the past tense of 'make'?
I ___ happy yesterday. (be동사의 과거형 - I)
What is the past tense of 'sleep'?
I ___ up at 7 AM. (wake의 과거형)
Which word means '마셨다'?
She ___ coffee this morning. (drink의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'walk'?
He ___ fast. (run의 과거형)
What is special about 'read' past tense?
exercises.explanation: 'read' 현재(/리드/)와 과거(/레드/)는 철자가 같지만 발음이 다릅니다.

exercises.question: I ___ a letter to my friend. (write의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'get'?
I ___ my friend at the cafe. (meet의 과거형)
Match the present with past tense:
Which is a regular verb (규칙 동사)?
She ___ me with my homework. (help의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'call'?
I ___ to music yesterday. (listen의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'open'?
She ___ the door. (close의 과거형)
Which word means '시작했다'?
I ___ my homework at 5 PM. (finish의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'clean'?
My mom ___ dinner. (cook의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'work'?
I ___ in Seoul for 5 years. (live의 과거형)
Match the present with past tense:
What is the past tense of 'love'?
She ___ the cake. (like의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'think'?
I ___ the answer. (know의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'tell'?
She ___ me the news. (tell의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'leave'?
I ___ my keys. (find의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'give'?
I ___ time with my family. (spend의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'forget'?
I ___ my password. (forget의 과거형)
Which sentence is correct?
They ___ tired yesterday. (be동사의 과거형 - they)
When do we use 'was'?
exercises.explanation: 'was'는 I, he, she, it과 함께 사용합니다.

exercises.question: She ___ at school yesterday. (be동사의 과거형)
Match the present with past tense:
How do you say '2일 전에' in English?
I saw him three days ___. (전에)
Which time expression is used with past tense?
I ___ TV last night. (watch의 과거형)
What does 'last weekend' mean?
We ___ hiking last weekend. (go의 과거형)
Which verb has the same spelling in present and past?
I ___ a book yesterday. (read의 과거형 - 발음: /red/)
Match the present with past tense:
What is the correct past tense sentence?
She ___ her grandparents last week. (visit의 과거형)
How do you change 'study' to past tense?
exercises.explanation: 자음 + y로 끝나는 동사는 y를 i로 바꾸고 -ed를 붙입니다.

exercises.question: I ___ to my friend about the movie. (talk의 과거형)
What is the difference between 'saw' and 'watched'?
exercises.explanation: 'saw'는 눈에 들어온 것, 'watched'는 집중해서 본 것입니다.

exercises.question: I ___ a strange bird in the park. (see의 과거형)
Match with correct time expression:
exercises.explanation: 과거 동사는 과거 시간 표현과 함께 사용합니다.

exercises.question: Which is an irregular verb?
He ___ home at 8 PM. (leave의 과거형)
What does 'I had fun' mean?
We ___ a great time at the party. (have의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'take a shower'?
She ___ a photo of the sunset. (take의 과거형)
Match the time expressions:
exercises.explanation: 각 시간 표현과 한국어 의미를 연결합니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence uses past tense correctly?
exercises.explanation: 과거 시간 표현 'yesterday'와 함께 과거형 'went'를 사용합니다.

exercises.question: She ___ me a gift for my birthday. (give의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'buy'?
I ___ a new laptop last month. (buy의 과거형)
Which verbs follow the 'ought' pattern?
I ___ it was a good idea. (think의 과거형)
Match verbs that sound the same:
What does 'I met him' mean?
We ___ at the cafe yesterday. (meet의 과거형)
What is the past tense of 'get up'?
I ___ up early this morning. (get의 과거형)
Which is correct for 'They be tired yesterday'?
The movie ___ at 7 PM. (start의 과거형)
Match the regular verb patterns:
What is the past tense of 'run'?
She ___ to catch the bus. (run의 과거형)
What does 'She left early' mean?
I ___ my umbrella at the restaurant. (leave의 과거형 - 두고 왔다)
How do you say '나는 어젯밤 잘 잤다' in English?
I ___ 8 hours last night. (sleep의 과거형)
Match the irregular verbs:
Complete: 'I ___ to the store and ___ some milk.'
exercises.explanation: 과거 문장에서는 모든 동사가 과거형이어야 합니다.

exercises.question: Yesterday, I ___ up, ___ breakfast, and ___ to school. (wake, eat, go)
exercises.explanation: 모든 동사가 과거형입니다: woke, ate, went.

exercises.question: What did you do last night?
She ___ a letter and ___ it to her friend. (write, send)
Which sentence describes a completed action?
We ___ the movie and ___ about it all night. (see, talk)
What is the negative past tense of 'I went'?
I didn't ___ to the party. (go)
How do you ask 'Did you eat breakfast?' in Korean?
Did you ___ the homework? (do)
Match the daily routine (past):
What is the question form of 'She went to the park'?
options: Did she went to the park?
Did she go to the park?
Does she went to the park?
Was she go to the park?
exercises.answer: Did she go to the park?

exercises.question: Where did you ___ last weekend? (go)
Complete: 'A: Did you see the movie? B: Yes, I ___.'
No, I ___ see the movie. (didn't)
Match present and past:
What time did you wake up yesterday?
I ___ a delicious dinner last night. (have)
Which is the correct order for a past routine?
options: Woke up → Had breakfast → Went to school
Wake up → Have breakfast → Go to school
Waking up → Having breakfast → Going to school
Will wake → Will have → Will go
exercises.answer: Woke up → Had breakfast → Went to school

exercises.question: She ___ her room and ___ the dishes. (clean, wash)
exercises.explanation: 두 동사 모두 규칙 동사로 -ed를 붙입니다.

exercises.question: What does 'I found my phone' mean?
I ___ my wallet. I ___ it at home. (lose, leave)
Match the 'ought' pattern verbs:
Complete: 'She ___ me a message yesterday.'
I ___ my best, but I ___ the test. (do, fail)
What is the past tense of 'begin'?
The class ___ at 9 and ___ at 3. (begin, end)
What is the past tense of 'swim'?
We ___ in the pool yesterday. (swim)
Match with Korean meaning:
exercises.explanation: 각 과거형 동사와 한국어 의미를 연결합니다.

exercises.question: How do you say 'I spent 2 hours studying' in English?
He ___ all his money on games. (spend)
What does 'I knew it!' mean?
exercises.explanation: 'I knew it!'은 예상했던 것이 맞았을 때 하는 표현입니다.

exercises.question: I ___ the answer, but I ___ to tell you. (know, forget)
Match the verbs with same vowel change pattern:
What is the past tense of 'sing'?
She ___ a beautiful song at the concert. (sing)
Complete the diary: 'Yesterday, I ___ (wake) up early, ___ (eat) breakfast, and ___ (go) to school.'
Last summer, I ___ to Japan and ___ many temples. (go, visit)
Match the regular verbs:
What is the difference between 'told' and 'said'?
She ___ me to wait. He ___ 'Hello'. (tell, say)
exercises.explanation: 'tell'은 사람 목적어가 필요하고, 'say'는 직접 인용에 사용합니다.

exercises.question: What is the past tense of 'sit'?
I ___ on the bench and ___ the sunset. (sit, watch)
Match the irregular verbs:
Complete: 'What ___ you ___ yesterday?'
A: What did you eat for dinner? B: I ___ pizza. (eat)
Which sentence tells about past experience?
options: I go to Paris every year.
I went to Paris last year.
I will go to Paris next year.
exercises.answer: I went to Paris last year.

exercises.question: I ___ English for 2 years. (study - 과거에 시작해서 지금은 안 함)
Complete the story with past tense:
